reviews: I will start out with the positive, the staff are generally good and try to help.   Now on to the negatives, the hotel is in poor condition.  The buildings are outdated and the beds dont have headboards (see pic).  The food is subpar and always cold.  The drinks are the lowest premium and they reuse the plastic cups.   Birds are everywhere and they eat off of the food that the staff leaves sitting around.  Old food and bird poop everywhere you eat ( see pics ).   The staff for some reason always wanted to see our wristbands but never asked anyone else.   We are in trying times, money and vacation are a blessing so dont go here !!!   This resort caters to locals and Spanish-speaking customers.

We had an amazing time, we loved the hotel and the room was nice and clean, upon arrival a gentleman from Veracruz showed us the way and help us with questions he was outstanding. the personnel was super friendly, the Thai restaurant was delicious the chef Oscar and Angelica make sure we had a great time! In the bar, Marcos makes sure we always have cool drinks and even makes me a special cocktail for Mother's day!  The Mexican night on Tuesdays is must!  We will definitely go back!

I booked this hotel not knowing very much about Cancun.  Once I arrived, I was hesitant to stay there based on the reviews, but decided to go check it out since I had already booked it.  The place looked run down from the outside.  I walked around the area, and did not see many people enjoying the pool and no one was a the small area of the beach that belong to the hotel.  It looked empty . I asked to see the rooms and was told that I could not see them until I checked in - not a good sign.  I am sure that if the outside was run down, the inside was in similar shape.  They took my money since they have a no refund policy.

My friend and I visited from Canada and stayed here for a couple nights and all we have to say is wow!! The room, the resort and beach was beautiful, the drinks were great and the food was always fresh. the staff was so friendly, shoutout to Kevin for all of his help, he made our stay spectacular :) we will definitely be back whenever we plan our next trip to Cancun!

Hotel is dirty service horrible and arrogant staff I have not been in such a dump since I was a student not worth the money this was my wedding trip and this hotel destroyed everything  loud music at night at pool food under par Anthony worst things is the staff that discriminates against foreigners

great service, high professionalism.  highest kudos to Angeli and Alexis. hotel not the newest but clean.  good food, great animations, service of the poolside bars of the highest standards. very good location in Cancun. I sincerely recommend it - a very good relation of the offer to the prices

The service was not the best. The people at the front desk can be short and rude. The food was not the best but the drinks were great.  The first room that we were given was dark and had a weird smell, the hot water did not work. We requested to have our room changed and the second room was okay but definitely not a great room.   We will definitely stay at a different hotel next time we travel to Cancun.

Okay, so are you British, or solely English speaking (or just not a speaker of Spanish), this may not be the hotel for you. I say that lightly, because if you do not want to be bothered and want full relaxtion, it most definetely is the place. So, the check in. We had travelled for 15 hours, been awake for nearly 30 and arrived at 8.30am. I let the hotel know in advance that we would be arriving at this time, however we were still unable to check in until 3pm. Which was very annoying. We had to wait to get to a room to sleep in and so made use of the bar.. which was closed until 11am, so we went down to the beach (which has bars, but is not part of this review). At 11am on the dot, we went to the bar near the Cielo restaurant, got a tequila sunrise and a beer and waited around

It was our first travel to Mexico 🇲🇽  Nice country with fanny  people.  Caribbean Sea is perfect 🤩   Big thanks for Rebeca Hernandez (from restaurant) for very good services and her beautiful  smile.                                                                                                                        Best regards,  Oliver Kahn and family From Ukraine 🇺🇦

Excellent service, beyond and and about .....simply the extra mile, this guys were no joke. ANGEL ,FERNANDO , HANNIA , DULCE , SAULO , ALEX , LUIS , took it out of the park!!!!! Question answer , service insane, extremely fast ,curious, respectful, by the book and did not care yo go the extra mile

The staff are very welcoming, Saulo, Alex, Hannia and Estaban were great fun and made us feel included! Loved the volleyball every day ❤️  Amaziny Bar staff especially Pedro !  Overall a brilliant holiday thank you so much!!

In my opinion, the best restaurant on the hotel with the best bar service by Marco Valle, who is also the best bartender of Cancún... must visit this great, pacefull and cool place where u can stay all your hollydays

Our stay was amazing, but the best part was the attention in the food place and with the Mr. Marco Valle, the Barman on the Cielito Lindo restaurant. Mr. Marco has the best music (reggae, ska, rock), attention, jokes and good vibe. If you visit Dos Playas, your first visit it must be to the bar with Mr. Marco for a Piña Colada. ✨

Carlos, Alberto, and Ismael were wonderful! We thoroughly enjoyed our evening at the Tai restaurant in Dos Playas. The chicken and the dessert were absolutely  delicious! We will definitely visit again soon!

Having a lovely time at the Hotel Franda Dos Playas! I've really enjoyed the beaches, relaxing pools and food! In particular the food and drinks at the Thai restaurant were the highlight! I loved the house cocktails and chicken curry! A big thank you to Carlos, Alberto and Ismael who were exceptional!

Very nice service in the Thai Restaurant. Carlos, Alberto and Ismael were so nice and attentive. The best food in the restaurant, no doubt. Its by reservation though, so make sure you make your reservation ahead of time. Highly recommend getting the guava house drink!

I enjoyed myself at Hotel Dos Playas. It’s close to the Ferry and it’s on the ocean side. The beach area is nice and clean. The service was excellent. They have shows every night. I had a lot of fun with Esteban, Saulo, Alex, Hannia, and Jose. That was my favorite show, they had me laughing!

We went second time to Mexico,this time was huge disappointment. Very dirty hotel, after complain to Love holidays they send as to another room which was smaller and felt like panishment. Staff speak very little English, in hotel mostly Spanish speaking people. We felt like isolated and discriminated! Food wise  names in Spanish unable to understand having food allergy struggle every day. Food was good. Plates always dirty. The burgers looked terble and taste similar.  No choice in drink bar at all just beer and tequila and vodka plus rum.  Plus some blue and red additives.  Entertainment in Spanish language unable to participate.  Do not listen to staff.... Buy little gifts from the people walking on the beach, much cheeper.  Prices for gifts in town horrendous, like little

WARNING TO ALL!!!  PLEASE DO NOT BOOK!!! TRUST THIS REVIEW!!!  I booked two weeks with all inclusive at this resort.  The food is really disgusting!!!!  You can not eat it. I expect at least decent food as I booked this vacation to relax and not worry about eating.   This is one of my worst bookings ever.  I have email formal complain directly to the hotel but I did not get any reply.  I will take this matter further and post on social media everywhere. This hotel resort is to be avoided. Nothing is as advertised.   The positive reviews which says otherwise are not true. Believe me I do not complain and I never leave review. However, travelling form far and being hungry for two weeks it is not a joke. I would not give any stars to this review.

Service and food was 5 star Oscar Reyes the chef was fantastic we had a great time as it was one of our first meals as a married couple all five courses were delicious and Angelica made sure to keep our drinks full

Hotel was pretty good. Food was delicious . The drink bar also , especially barman Jose Rios , he was very helpful and nice . Greetings from guys from Poland , Adrian , Michal and Jarek. It was very nice vacation :)

Jose Rios great service and tasty food and drinks!Our room was perfectly. Very positive personal. Cold beer!)) Beach and sea is unreal . We will back of course. A lot of activity in hotel, yoga, volleyball!

Pros: - The staff was very friendly, especially Israel and Natanael at the Cielito Lindo restaurant. I would recommend making a reservation and having dinner there, the food was amazing (the best food in this hotel), and Israel gave us the best service ever.  - I also want to make a shout-out to the entertainment team, they did a great job during my stay with live music almost every night. People were dancing, and singing along which made me really love it. Cons: - Room is kinda outdated: you can hear people talking from the outside all the time, the faucet was leaking, the toilet wasn't flushing, etc.  - The food from the buffet was not good at all, but I asked some people and they said it was good, so I guess this is just my personal opinion. I prefer having dinner at Cielito

It was good experience with hotel and the view they have is next level. Everyone is very friendly here. Jose and Pedro rockstar bar tender. Was worth the money spent. Mayan show was something I have never experienced before. A Big thanks to everyone for making our vacation one of a kind.

The hotel staff made us feel so welcome right from the start. Everyone was so friendly and helpful. The variety of food, drinks and the clean rooms were all fantastic, The beach was beautiful! Yeing and Miranda so helpful in the office, Drisdey greeted us daily making us feel like family. Jose Rios, Pedro and Marco Valle my friends!! Made us so many fantastic drinks,  We had a wonderful time and highly recommend Dos Playas.

The staff was so friendly and nice. Especially Pedro, Juan, Jose Rios and Josmar. Then those amazing animators – they had prepared programe for the whole day and they did it wonderfully. The food was really good, we were able to try an authentic Mexican cuisine. The only minus was, that the seaweed wasn't removed from the beach after a storm.

First time in Mexico, had a great time! Food was tasty and traditional, 2 minutes to get to the beautiful beach, amazing staff make you feel at home! Came down for my girlfriend and I birthdays and do not regret the choice! A HUGE shoutout to the best barmen we could have asked for Mr. Jose Rios and Pedro, always friendly, on point with the drinks, very hospitable. You can find them by the pool bar next to the Iguanas restaurant. Gracias!!! 💪🏼🍻

The hotel was fantastic! Everyone treated us like family and always had a great experience with anyone we met! Big props to Jose Rio and Pedro at the bar!! Their were peacocks and iguanas roaming free and its walking distance to the hotel strip with shops and great eats!  Will definitely come back!

If your looking for ice cold drinks and awesome tunes, go see Marco Valle at the beach bar and you wont disappointed!! Don't forget to bring a beach coconut for some Coco locos!   When night arrives and your feeling thirsty, look no further than the exceptional service over at Iguana  bar.  Jose Rios and the boys will keep you hydrated as the music gets bumping! Micheladas are legendary! Try an Ojo Rojo!

I real recommend this hotel is real good not big like the others for American. Very familiar. Me and mi girlfriend and polish friends are really happy to visit it. Service is really good and all staff are otway smile a special Jose Rios always help full so  "Mucho Gracia" for you and the others personel.

My friend and I stayed here for 4 days and had a really good time. All the staff members were very kind and helpful. Jose vios at the bar is the man! I would highly recommend if you are ever staying in Cancun.

An excellent experience! The resort is right next to Playa Tortuga, a sandy beach, and it has a variety of delicious food and drinks. Our room was spacious and comfortable, and all the staff were friendly and helpful. Highly recommeded.

I really enjoyed my vacation at Dos Playas. The staff was super friendly and accommodating. I came to the resort with my swim team for a training camp and we all had a pleasant experience. We really enjoyed entertainment by Esteban, Miguel, Eliot, and the rest of his team. They were always so energetic and made us smile lots. The staff was super inviting and always made us feel welcome at the resort. Many of us on this trip would love to come back!

The staff were great, very helpful. Luis Cen & Jairo Hdez both looked after my husband and myself well in the restaurant each day. Even brought our coffee without asking!  The Thai restaurant was also very good, with the young chef making it a special meal. The beaches are very lovely, beautiful white sand. We enjoyed having so many Mexican guests here, it was a taste of another culture, not just American tourists and we enjoyed that  On the down side, the hotel was undergoing renovations and our room was there. Workmen were loud, and we had concrete falling onto our balcony - some just missed my laundry and actually landed on me which was a safety concern   Nice clean rooms

Ezequiel, Alfredo, Chef Amelia and Brenda were amazing! Such great service. They were very attentive and made sure we were always taken care of. It was a very pleasant experience. Thank you so much for the great holiday!

Great service in the restaurant & bar area! Santiago & Jose Rios were very friendly & attentive! Rooms & restaurant & bar area is right off the beach access. Waking up to breakfast & eat right off the beach.

Run away!  Never again. So dirty place! Awful food. Loud rooms by the street. Very messy. No tequila in the bar. Guests eating in the pool so you can found their everything! All day dirty plates everywhere. Management of this place not exist! They don’t do nothing. Only staff in the bar’s working very hard. Check the pictures of names the great staff.

I love my vacations. The service was perfect.  Yeing speak in french with me to make me pleasure because my english is verry bad and she tries to make me fine. Thanks to her and her nice smile with every body. Jose rios to the bar was so nice with my Kids and he makes special drinks any times. Luis cen to te buffet was gentle and sweet with us ! Thanks to everybody !!!  Annie

Super trip Amazing place all waiter was very friendly Jose Rios barmaid make us many drinks from tequila to pina colada!! And special pina colada for kids my kids say they feel a 5 stars hotel.  All members of the crew is good pedro,Eduardo, israel and all the buffet crew !!!  Felice navidad !!!!  Louis Philippe

Great hotel location. Near to the beach. Beach is clean. Evry day interesting animations. Mexican evening with dance show - the best! Delicious food. Nice service. Jose Rios the best barman! Great holiday!

It is very cool, the food and the bar was delicious, special thanks to professional bartenders Jose Rios and Santiago Fidel, they are professional high level, thank you, guys the blue lagoon is in my soul

Really good barmaid (Jose Rios) really really good service had a great time but really great experience and big big thumb up to Jose à big thank you for this wonderful experience at Mexico and thank you for you service

I'll preface this by saying my husband and I are mid-thirties and have travelled to several different all inclusive resorts around Mexico. We are visiting from Canada.  Cleanliness:  This place gets a 1.5 for cleanliness and maintenance, all around. From the buffet/restaurants to the rooms and grounds, it's majorly lacking. There is always trash EVERYWHERE and no one seems to care the fix the problem. It would be nice if the other guests had an ounce of care, but clearly they don't either. Walls are dirty. Floors/ground is dirty. Windows are dirty.  Pools:  The "activities pool" is supposed to be adult only and have all kinds of stuff going on, but the entertainment staff don't really start the activities... and since we don't speak spanish, the few announcements they did make

In a word, gross.  This place is uncared for and dumpy.  Room service dishes with half eaten food remained on hallway table after attendant showed me the room and stayed there overnight.  Moved them one floor down onto stair landing where they remained at noon the next day when I checked out.  “Not my job” mentality of staff.  Guests ignore no smoking signs and smoke wafts throughout property as a result.  Door too roof rusted out and unsecured.   My room (304) had been updated and seemed nice but was neglected and finished in slipshod manner, wallpaper job on headboard wall was a joke with wavy edge lines and pencil cutting marks visible.  There were strange smears on newly installed surfaces and construction dust on edges that were not checked after construction “cleanup.”

Overall a great property and experience.  Antonio in the restaurant was amazing.  Antonio was both professional, attentive to all his customers and by far the best we have experienced in many years.  We were visiting from Canada and would definitely recommend Hotel Dos Playas to others. The Tuesday night Mexican Festival was both exciting and well done not to mention a lot of work for all involved. Well Done Antonio and all the Staff at the resort.  Thank You Mark

I stayed a few years ago and I had some issues so I decided to hierve it try one more time. I was glad I did.   As your read it is next to the beach and they are pools and there is food and drinks if you choose all included.Per day for food is about 60 US dollars. I did not do all-included because I went all over the place and I ate outside on the restaurants and street.   From this hotel, you can go to the rest of hotels, zona Hotelera or downtown cancun, mercados 28  (Tourist) and 23 (local and cheaper) by taxi, UBER, (send me a question about this) or cheapest, local bus which is 24 hours.   Overall, this was a great stay. Activities staff did a lot of things everyday. Mexican night is full of music, food, drinks and lots of fun.

Brilliant Staff, good cuisine.  We have been so lucky to find this hotel... no bad feelings all wasbrilliant... special thanks to: Jose Rios,Santiago, fidel and many more you made our stay here perfect... thanks a million

Amazing service! Israel was very accommodating, I have many food allergies and there was no issue! The food was delicious. He changed the music to our preference and was fluent in English and Spanish for an amazing night out at our resort.

Ismael the chef in the Thai restaurant was an excellent chef, very good at what he does. 5 course meal all good was delicious. Speaks in English and Spanish explaining his dishes. Served with wine. Very professional, very eventful night.

A big thanks to the hotel - The rooms are big and the people lovely but a special thanks to Jose Rios&Juan Pedro - you look always for the people to have the best drinks and help us in cancun.. great guys… thank you guys you are great!!

Giovanni and drisdey Rob the bestest. You guys were the best. Had a blast with you all. Bin Jovi rocks. Good experience. . But my sister dancing when she is very shy great great great.   Zumba was great. Love you guy

Great place and really fun staff. Had an impromptu funny game of water volleyball with Esteban, Giovani, Paola, Miguel and Drisdey the staff. Loved all of it. You should definately come and visit. Also the night entertainment was really top notch

Firstly, the quality of service is outstanding: José Rios, Pedro and Fidel are doing a Great job at the pool bar. Reception is super efficient In guidance and improving the stay. The playas are very close to the hotel premises, amazingly white sand, clear sea and carribean weather :)

The beach and plants around the hotel were gorgeous, the air was clean and great, the rooms were comfortable and clean, and the food was delicious. Many peacocks roamed the property! The entertainment staff always had a great attitude and never ran out of energy to make something fun happen. Much thanks to Jairo and Jacqueline who took such good care of us at Cielito Lindo and Iguanas. And lots of thanks to the incredible bartenders! Salvador, Pedro, and Santiago had so much creativity for mixing up drinks not even on the menu, huge smiles, and were great friends while we were there! There was a huge variety in food, and the fruit (especially the papaya) was amazingly fresh. The freshly grilled burgers at the grill by Cielito Lindo were also incredible, and once again, the

Gorgeous beach, summer in February, incredible staff, delicious food, bottomless margaritas, endless activities, and great water pressure! Oh yeah, and PEACOCKS walking around freely.  Thank you to Jacqueline and Jaeir for waiting on us at the restaurant. And thank you to Salvador, Pedro, and Santiago for mixing up extra special drinks for us.  And an EXTRA special thank you to Paula and the rest of the entertainment staff for making an amazing time out of every minute of the day.    It was everything we could have expected at such a good price. I am most pleased and impressed, will recommend to friends and family.

My friend and I really enjoyed the yoga class given by Drisdey and her fellow instructors - Giovanni and Paula. They have a great energy. The restaurant staff and the bar tenders  offer great service as well.

We went for vacations. The room was good, the buffet was also good, although it could be wonderful a few more options specially for children to eat., But for us, it was great, so much salad, fruits. We try almost all restaurants. And there was a Mexican night that It was entertaining and beautiful. The hotel employees were respectful and good. And I forget a book and they sent it back, Miranda Pérez, was really helpful with it and I really appreciate it. For my family it was great, the beach is truly amazing, the pools were good too. I will be back, this place is great, that is why I can see why so many people around the world stays here. Great for families  and single people who would love to enjoy a great time. And the music was also great, I listened rock and electronic

We had a great time at Dos Playas Farandas. The staff is fantastic. Special mention to Pedro at the pool bar, Israel at the Cielito Lindo and  Adelina at the Iguana restaurante. The rooms are clean. They need a little bit of updating but the bed was ultra comfortable. Great entertainment daily and the room service \ mini bar was on point. Thank you!  Judith y Maxime

Keeping in mind this is a 3 star hotel the rooms are small with little or no updating. The food is plentiful but no flavour and cold. I don’t know about you but I like my egg/sausage warm! Most of the food at the smaller side restaurants have precooked Pattie’s that are warmed prior to serving. That’s about the only way to get a warm meal here. Lots of sugar water they call juice as well.

had a great experience there. The staff was very nice! starting with Antonio, the server at Iguana restaurant. Also the 2 cooks at the Thai restaurants Mario & Ismael were very nice. The manager speaks French. She was very helpful she actually found and kept something valuable to me that I had lost. The rooms are spacious and well kept. We will be coming back 100%

Great location directly at the beach! The staff is very kind. Especially the pizza guys Juan Gonzalez and Zeus! They always did a fantastic job and made a perfect pizza! The surrounding of the hotel is also really nice and everything is accommodate to reach within the hotel zone and also Cancun downtown. Can recommend the hotel considering the price per night!

Very nice spot directly in the hotel zone with many different opportunities to eat and to do activities. The stuff is very caring and kind, espacially Zeus and Juan Gonzales at the pizza restaurant, that never hasistated to do everything to get you the best experience possible.

i definitely recommend the thai place on the resort. freddy and ismael are very nice and make great food! i did the private dinner which was a 4 course meal and we also had sushi from here i recommend the California roll.

Amazing experience with the staff. The bar, security and meal staff everyone was so attentive. A big thanks and gratitude to the fun squad, Drisdey, Esteban, Miguel, Paola and Giovani, who made my son feel like family and had a blast doing the activities.

Excellent service at the bar and restaurant, they had a big variety of non-alcoholic and alcoholic drinks. The food was very good, not the same things everyday. We really enjoyed our days here and would come back.

My friend and I had a great time here. It’s reasonably close to good restaurants and fun clubs. Bartender Jose Rios made our trip even more enjoyable. Always smiling and making us great cocktails all the time. The whole staff is friendly and doing their best to please the guests.

We had a reservation at dos playas, my family and I where looking forward to enjoying our time at a cancun resort for the first time.  When we arrived at the resort, we where told, that a pipe har burst so they where sending their guests to a sister hotel.  It took us an hour longer for them to get us a taxi and take us to the new hotel.  The difference in amenities, as-well as appearance and service where very notorious.  Complaining to the front desk had no result and I hope to get a call from corporate.

Jose Rios David Santiago the best barmans in mexico! Awesome drinks, awesome food, beautiful place. Great beach, incredible view. I recommend this place for every one who need to rest and have some fun.
I like this resort so much I will recommend my friends to visit this resort, the staff was nice and friendly David, Fidel, Fredy and specifically Jose Rios served us well. Special thanks to Jose Rios

Everything was good and I don't want to share one bad experience I had at Mexican restaurant on  25th Feb the seever didn't served good and food he serves was not good and talk well the guy who was serving burgers was also very rude didn't make the good burgers he was just looking for good tip

We are group of six friends and we spend there one week in April 2023. There are nice garden and beech, good services. Very pleasured vacation, friendly staff, especially our favorite waiter Mr. Jose Guadalupe.  His care of us was excellent.

Overall a fantastic experience, the hotel was a bit run down in places but the food at breakfast and the sit down dinner was delicious . We ate at the restaurant directly looking onto the beach. The staff were very friendly, the barman on the beach and Jacky at breakfast were fantastic. It was nice to be in a more authentic hotel and not one of these massive impersonal chains. There are plenty of pools, although slightly lacking in sunbeds, they look over the sea and a really comfy. It looks like they have refurbished some of the rooms and are doing it step by step. Although the bathroom could do with replacing, the beds were good quality. All in all a great holiday, great value for money.

Had an amazing 5 course Thai dinner freshly made in front of us by Ismael at Hotel Dos Playas Faranda. Both Ismael and Eduardo were extremely attentive and friendly, and the food was delicious. Will definitely return again. Highly recommend!

My wife and I had a wonderful stay. Our server Guadalupe made sure we got everything we required. He and the rest of the staff were first class. The resort was clean and great beach access. Loved every minute of our stay.

Ismael is great. Even though he was cooking but always smiled and tell us about food and spices. Very pleasant experience. Enjoyed our dinner food was delicious. Nice sitting area with beautiful people. Thank you for your services and atmosphere

We had a great time at hotel dos playas. Animation team was great. Miguel and jovani were the best. Jose and Santiago at the bar were  awesome with their delicious cocktails.  Juan and Zeus at The pizza restaurant were mind bellowing. Israel is a great chef at the sushi restaurant. Towel team- Diana and Jane very nice. Jane at the front desk very very helpful. Highly recommend everyone to stay here.

Just come back from a fab 2 weeks at Dos Playas Faranda Cancun. What a great hotel to chill and unwind. The staff were all really helpful especially Joilo and Luis Con from the restaurant who were so helpful, kind and friendly. They were there literally everyday with their great smiles and our drinks were there before we even asked. The food was great snd felt spoilt for choice in the restaurant as well as pizza, sushi, burgers and hot dogs. The Mexican food was the best though. The room was clean and tidy with lovely fresh towels and a great hot shower. The beach was perfect with plenty of sun beds. There were 5 pools and lots of areas on the beach and around the pools to rest and relaxed. It would be great for all ages and very family friendly. Great location near the ferry

I had a wonderful experience at the Hotel Dos Playas Faranda. The staff is great! Everybody is friendly and ready to help. They went above and beyond to make me feel comfortable. The room was clean and well maintained every day. The chef did a great job to cook a variety of food, fruits, vegetables, and we even had dinner in a garden with a show! The bars serve great choice of drinks. Everyday activities, like yoga, zumba, volleyball in a swimming pool. Alive show with real Mexican singers, dancers, actors. Just to choose! The location is perfect, close to everything (bus stop, ferry, pharmacy, money exchange, convenience store). The hotel has its own lovely beach and a tour agent. Special thanks to Ms. Yeing and Rodrigo  for your hospitality and exceptional service. I highly

I have had the best time amazing staff I couldn't be happier ❤️ Diana Miguel estaphan Giovani y drisdey  and all the restaurant and kitchen garden room staff all fantastic  .Everyone so happy and helpful. I will definitely come back

Excellent little spot. I feel like most negative reviews are from ppl that expect next door service of Riu for the budget costs. After the first day you realize the charm here and love it more and more. Could some things be improved? Sure. But that will also come at extra cost. For now you get great food, decent drinks, lovely beaches and not overly crowded hotel.  My suggestion to the hotel would be to have a coffee station available all day long and not just for meals.

Good hotel with great location for the price.  Friendly atmosphere, any problems quickly solved by the reception.   Small, nice beach - clean seaweed.   The time spent here was made more pleasant by great bartenders.  The best were Jose Rios and Manuel who made delicious drinks at the bar and served tequila. The most beautiful drinks. Iguanas and peacocks on the hotel grounds.

This was a wonderful experience! I would highly recommend this resort to anyone.  They have many different pools where you can swim, beautiful, beach access, an inflatable obstacle course on the water, jet skis, and little shows/music every night.  The service at this resort is also fantastic! I would like to take a moment to thank the following staff members for their wonderful service : Yeing, Suri, Santiago and Yoab at the front desk  Josefina in the mini market  Jordan, Guadalupe, Santiago and Peter at Iguanas restaurant   Manuel at the beach bar who makes the best drinks, and Alexis who makes amazing g tacos!!!  Raul the artesian was also very kind.  I would also like to think the housekeeping staff, we kept our room immaculate, and made little animals out of the towel to

If I had to rate only the hotel  I would probably give 2 stars. The hotel is old, run down. The room we got was small, with a fungus in the bathroom and a terrible smell. It was certainly not a room where we could comfortably spend 2 weeks on our honeymoon, there was not even a place to take clothes out of the suitcases. My rating is influenced only by the rating of the service! The owners should appreciate what employees they have! I have never experienced such nice, polite and helpful service! Our favorites from the second shift Guadalupe and Fidel,  from the morning Armando, Jairo ( Lewandowski :) ), Louis and many other people whose names I don't remember they took care of us every single day! Of course, I couldn't forget about the guys from the bar - Jose Rios, Alfredo,

The reception desk (i.e. Rodrigo, Sinhue, Yeing, Miranda), restaurant (Fidel, Jairo and collagues) and annimation (Drisday, Miguel, Giovanni and Esteban) teams were wonderful, all of them very helpful, friendly and attentive. I enjoyed very much the daily morning activities like strech yoga and aqua-aerobics.  I also very much enjoyed the daily evening events which included salsa and cumbia dancing and lots of Mexican / Latin American music which was in parts life music from professional artists.

A place next to the beach and close to the bigger hotels and downtown. Eve thought this might not be as big as the other hotels, still there is a lot of food and activities goin on.   The animation group, Miguel, Drísdey Esteban y Giovani did an excellent job. They provided activities, music and an awesome entertainment throughout the day and night. Staying at Dos Platas was fun because everyone of them.   Much appreciated the food from Ismael, Juan , Haroldo, Miguel, Jesus and Maricela. From the pizzeria, Sushi, Thai and marquesinas. Everyone did an amazing job of being professional and easy to provide with great food.   Overall a great place to stay. You light get a better rate through their web site. Room 3000 and close to restaurant Cielito Lindo are facing the beach. Also,

We arrived at this hotel planning to enjoy a few days of vacation with my husband. The lady at the reception  serious face and was not at all friendly.  They placed us in a room located between air conditioning filters.  The bed and pillows are super uncomfortable.  The condition of hygiene and terrible health.  The food disgusting and everything dirty.  The worst thing was the second night we couldn't sleep because of so much noise from all sides and they were hammering in another nearby room.  We decided with my husband to change hotels and when requesting a refund of the unused days they took advantage of discounting one more night.  I DO NOT RECOMMEND IT, it is a waste of money from him.  lousy service also

Excellent place.  Great service.  Drinks are really good and so is the food.  Special drinks - don’t even have to ask.  Buffet was good.  Ice cream trolley.  Sushi, pizza. Hot dogs, fries, seafood paella. No lack of food.

The customer service provided by Fidel, Jordan, and Jose Rios, Raul at Dos Playas Faranda Hotel was exceptional. They were friendly, attentive, and went above and beyond to make our stay memorable. The strong tequila served at the hotel was also noteworthy. I highly recommend this hotel for a great vacation experience.

I would be delighted to write a review about the excellent customer service I experienced at Dos Playas Faranda Hotel, particularly from the restaurant staff - Fidel, Jordan, and Jose Rios, Raul.   Firstly, I must mention that the tequila served at the hotel was strong and top-notch, perfect for anyone looking for an authentic taste of Mexico. The quality of drinks served at the hotel was impressive, and the staff members were always happy to recommend new and exciting drinks to try.

Just arrived back in the UK on Sunday. Have spent 7 nights at Hotel Los Playas Faranda. We booked all inclusive. The location and beaches where lovely. Everything kept clean. Options for food where good. All staff where really friendly.  Good Points:  First this has to be Lupito the waiter at the restaurant. He was brilliant. Smiley, happy, polite and went the extra mile to make us feel like we were on our holidays. The other waiting on staff were also very friendly. Then the barman by the beach. The funny Cocktail maker (didn't get his name) he was very funny and made us with fantastic cocktails and provided entertainment whilst making the drinks. "Maximum Power" was his catchphrase. Top bloke! The Tacos and Burgers next to the bar were also decent! The hot sauce was hot
